scripts.start: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ipEnv=$env:VITE_HMR_HOST; function Get-LanIP { try { $cfgs = Get-NetIPConfiguration | Where-Object { $_.IPv4DefaultGateway -and $_.NetAdapter.Status -eq 'Up' }; foreach($c in $cfgs){ foreach($a in $c.IPv4Address){ $ip=$a.IPAddress; if($ip -match '^(10|192\.168|172\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-1]))\.') { return $ip } } } } catch { } return 'localhost' }; if([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($ipEnv) -or ($ipEnv -match '^(YOUR_LAN_IP|0\.0\.0\.0)$')) { $ip=Get-LanIP } else { $ip=$ipEnv }; $apiEnv=$env:VITE_API_URL; $apiPort=if([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($env:VITE_API_PORT)){ '8000' } else { $env:VITE_API_PORT }; if([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($apiEnv)) { $api=('http://' + $ip + ':' + $apiPort) } else { $api=$apiEnv }; Write-Host ('HMR Host: ' + $ip); Write-Host ('API:      ' + $api); $env:VITE_HMR_HOST=$ip; $env:VITE_HMR_PORT='5173'; $env:VITE_PORT='5173'; $env:VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=('http://' + $ip + ':5173'); $env:VITE_API_URL=$api; try { netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='Laravel 1620 (Dev)' dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=1620 profile=private | Out-Null } catch { }; try { netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='Vite 5173 (Dev)' dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=5173 profile=private | Out-Null } catch { }; try { netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=('Django ' + $apiPort + ' (Dev)') dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=$apiPort profile=private | Out-Null } catch { }; Write-Host ('Local:   http://localhost:1620/queue'); Write-Host ('LAN:     http://' + $ip + ':1620/queue'); Write-Host ('Vite:    http://' + $ip + ':5173'); Write-Host ('API:     ' + $api); npm run _start"
scripts.local_start: concurrently "php artisan serve --port 1620" "npm run dev" "start http://127.0.0.1:1620/" "php artisan queue:work"
